summary: The wives of three wealthy men are kidnapped and held for a $3 million ransom, but one of the men doesn't want to pay his share.
cast: Howard Duff|Leslie Nielsen|Sheree North|Barbara Parkins|Robert Reed|John Saxon|Tisha Sterling|Anthony Zerbe|Richard Davalos|Frank McRae|Bart La Rue|Howard Platt|John Gilgreen|John Forker
title: El rescate
